query:
INSERT INTO appointments (clinic_id, patient_id, patient_name, patient_phone, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_type, chair, treatment_type, status, duration, notes)
SELECT 
  1,
  id,
  name,
  phone,
  DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) + INTERVAL 8 HOUR,
  '08:00',
  'orthodontic_treatment',
  'Sillón 1 Oro',
  treatment_type,
  'scheduled',
  60,
  'Test appointment'
FROM patients 
WHERE notes = 'Test patient'
LIMIT 10;

SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM appointments WHERE notes = 'Test appointment';
